name: 2nd International Conference on Political Sciences
content: 2nd International Conference on Political Sciences (POLITICALSCIENCES) Connect and Network with the Best Minds in Political Science Welcome to the 2nd International Conference on Political Science, an interdisciplinary forum for academics, researchers, and practitioners to address contemporary problems and challenges in governance and politics, share ideas, and present research findings. The conference, which will take place in London, United Kingdom, from July 19â€“21, 2024, intends to offer a setting for thoughtful discussion, perceptive analysis, and lively discussion on a variety of subjects, including public policy and political theory as well as international relations and comparative politics. Whether you join as a speaker or an attendee, Political Science Conference 2024 is packed full with learning and networking opportunities. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding with ISBN and unique DOI number assigned to each paper or in indexed international journals like SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The POLITICALSCIENCES 2024 will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual component for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, and connect. In-Person participants and speakers will get Letter of Invitation after registration.
